descriptionHtml:
This mod is not up for endorsment, just a useful mod, although, endorsing would help others discover it so that it can be useful to them aswell.

These are simple bat files, that you can use in the console(~) \"Bat TrueMaster\".

!!!!!!!!( Great if you wanna use Legendary Difficulty....xD)!!!!!!!!!

I made these with \"skyrim character editor v1.1\", Newer Version out now(1.3)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3142
Not my program!.

Each file changes your; Health, Magikca, Stamina, and every skill level.
I changed HP, MP, SP amounts to level out the skill changes(I gots no skill)

EasyMaster:
All skills are change to 30
HP,MP,SP are changed to 300

MasterNorm:
All skills are changed to 20
HP,MP,SP are changed to 200

TrueMaster:
All skills are change to 1
HP,MP,SP are not changed and stay at 100
-
EasyMaster : Enjoy.
MasterNorm : Play to win.
TrueMaster : Have Fun beating someone with your Wiffle Ball Sword.

Intallation:
Extract The folder and drag the Text file/\'s you want into your skyrim main directory, Not in the data folder.

If you endorse, it would not be for the skill in the creation of this mod...(LOL), it would be to support the idea of the \"Sub-Difficulties\" mod.
Master is the only one i would ever suggest for Sub-Difficulties, the only time i have died in other difficulties, is when i don\'t watch my health bar....., Master is the only true way to play the game, when enjoying the Work-For-It, !Large! part of the game, others would be to get use to and/or enjoy the game, like blowing $|-|!T up, with out the consequences.

.___________________________My-Other-Mods___________________________________________.

Extra Ingot Options for smelters:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32595
-

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27685

._____________________________Coming-Soon____________________________________________.
MODs are back online.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Skyrim Market Place: Find everything you need and more, for a price.(Part of another mod)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Hunter\'s Mansion: A place to cook and fish, and more.(0% Lost in deletion, Remaking)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
The lost Temple:
A temple long lost, taken over by powerful creatures and Falmer Under the command of demons, and a portal.
+
SkyIsland:
An island in the sky, an angels Post to Protect skyrim from Demons, angel Weapons & Armor designs were past dawn to the elvens but not perfected as they were not forged in the Holy Forge, the only way there, is The Lost Temple.
Holy Magic, Weapons & Armors can be forged here, as long as you do not attack anything.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Catacombs To Hell:
With Multible Diablo-Like dungeons, they are sealed away from Skyrims surface, Filled with traps and creatures these places are Very Dangerous, deeper in the dungeons is a gate and a gate-guardien that seals the demons from getting out, past the gate are many powerful demons that would tear apart a mammoth like piranha, deeper down, past all the demons, is Hell!, everything is on fire, smoldering rivers, and many more demons with Large Devil Lords, and an Evil Demi-God, Ruler Of Hell.
The daedra Have Learned a lot from Hells teachings, there armor and weapons seem the same, but fail! in comparison to there Strangth and effects, as the Daedric\'s were not forged in the Hell Forge.
Evil magic, Weapons & Armors can be forged here as long as nothing is trying to kill you.
author: SkyMARIN
